1: אַחַר֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>After</n> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>these things</n> הָאֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> כְּשֹׁ֕ךְ <sup>7918 </sup> <n>was appeased</n> חֲמַ֖ת <sup>2534 </sup> <n>when the wrath</n> הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of king</n> אֲחַשְׁוֵר֑וֹשׁ <sup>325 </sup> <n>Ahasuerus</n> זָכַ֤ר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>he remembered</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> וַשְׁתִּי֙ <sup>2060 </sup> <n>Vashti</n> וְאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>and what</n> עָשָׂ֔תָה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and what she had done</n> וְאֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>and what</n> נִגְזַ֖ר <sup>1504 </sup> <n>and what was decreed</n> עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n>
